WSCp MARK 13.35 Eornostlice wacigeað,
ge nyton hwænne þæs huses hlaford cymð þe on æfen þe on midre nihte þe on hancrede þe on mergen.
WSCp MARK 13.36 Þe læs he eow slapende gemete þonne he færinga cymð.
WSCp MARK 13.37 Soðlice þæt ic eow secge
eallum, ic hit secge,
waciað.
WSCp MARK 14.1 Soþlice þa æfter twam dagum wæron Eastron;
& þa sohton þa heahsacerdas & þa boceras hu hi hine mid facne namon & ofslogon.
WSCp MARK 14.2 Ða cwædon hi,
næs na on freolsdæge þe læs þæs folces gehlyd wurde.
WSCp MARK 14.3 And þa se hælend wæs on Bethania on Simones huse anes hreoflan & þar sæt; þa com an wif & hæfde hyre sealfbox deorwyrþes nardes; & tobrocenum sealfboxe ofer his heafod aget.
WSCp MARK 14.4 Sume hit unwurðlice forbæron & betwux him sylfum cwædon,
for hwi wæs þisse sealfe forspillednes geworden?
WSCp MARK 14.5 Þeos sealf mihte beon geseald to þrim hund penegum & beon þearfum geseald;
& yrsydon agen hi.
WSCp MARK 14.6 Ða cwæð se hælend,
lætað hi;
Hwi synt ge hire grame;
God weorc heo on me worhte.
WSCp MARK 14.7 Soðlice symble ge habbað þearfan mid eow
& þonne ge wyllað ge magon him teala don;
Me ge symble nabbað.
WSCp MARK 14.8 Þeos sealde þæt heo hæfde;
Heo com to smyrianne minne lichaman on byrgene.
WSCp MARK 14.9 Soðlice ic eow secge
swa hwar swa þis godspell gebodad bið on eallum middanearde bið gebodod þæt heo þis on his gemynde dyde.
WSCp MARK 14.10 Ða Iudas Scarioth, þæt is, wiþersaca, an of þam twelfum, ferde to þam heahsacerdum þæt he hine belæwde.
WSCp MARK 14.11 Þa hi þis gehyrdon hi fahnodon & beheton him feoh to syllanne
& he smeade hu he hine digellice sealde.
WSCp MARK 14.12 And þam forman dæge azimorum þa hi Eastron offrodon his leorningcnihtas him sædon,
hwyder wylt þu þæt we faron & gegearwian þe þæt ðu Eastron ete?
WSCp MARK 14.13 Ða sende he twegen of his leorningcnihtum & sæde him,
gað on þa ceastre
& inc agen yrnð sum man berende sume wæterflaxan;
Folgiað him.
WSCp MARK 14.14 & swa hwyder swa he inngæð, secgað þæs huses hlaforde,
vre Lareow segð,
hwar is min gysthus & min gereord
hwar ete ic Eastron mid minum leorningcnihtum?
WSCp MARK 14.15 And he inc geswutelað mycele healle gedæfte
& gegeearwiað us þara.
WSCp MARK 14.16 Þa ferdon his leorningcnihtas & comon on þa ceastre & fundon hit eall swa he sæde & gegearwodon þa Eastron.
WSCp MARK 14.17 Soðlice þa æfen com him twelfum mid him, WSCp MARK 14.18 Sittendum & etendum sæde se hælend,
soðlice ic eow secge þæt eower an þe mid me yt gesylð me.
WSCp MARK 14.19 Ða ongunnon hi beon dreorige & betwux him cweðan,
cwyst þu
eom ic hit?
WSCp MARK 14.20 Þa sæde he him,
an of eow twelfum me sylð se ðe his hand on disce mid me dypð.
WSCp MARK 14.21 And witodlice mannes sunu gæð swa be him awriten is;
Wa þam menn þurh þone þe mannes sunu geseald bið,
betere him wære þæt se mann acenned nære.
WSCp MARK 14.22 Him þa etendum afeng se hælend hlaf & hine bletsiende bræc & sealde him & þus cwæð,
nimað;
ðis ys min lichama.
WSCp MARK 14.23 & onfeng calice & Gode þancas dyde & sealde him
& ealle him ofdruncon.
WSCp MARK 14.24 Þa sæde he him,
ðis ys min blod þære niwan cyðnesse þæt bið for manegum agoten.
WSCp MARK 14.25 Soðlice ic eow secge þæt ic heonon forð ne drince of þyses wingeardes cynne oð þone dæg þonne ic hine niwne drince on Godes rice.
WSCp MARK 14.26 And gecwedenum lofe hi ferdon on elebergena Munt.
WSCp MARK 14.27 Ða cwæð se hælend,
ealle ge beoð geuntreowsode on þisse nihte
forþam þe hit awriten is,
ic slea þæne hyrde
& beon þa scep todræfede.
WSCp MARK 14.28 Ac æfter þam þe ic arise, ic cume beforan eow on Galileam.
WSCp MARK 14.29 Þa sæde Petrus him,
þeah ðe ealle swicion ne swicige ic þe na.
WSCp MARK 14.30 Ða cwæð se hælend,
soþlice ic þe secge þæt ðu on þisse nihte ær hana tuwa crawe þriwa wiðsæcst min.
WSCp MARK 14.31 & he þæs ðe mare spræc,
& þeah me gebyrige mid þe to sweltene, ne ætsace ic þin;
& swa hi cwædon ealle.
WSCp MARK 14.32 Þa comon hi to anum tune þæs nama wæs Gezemani,
& he cwæð to his leorningcnihton,
